core

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Main
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMain

    public final class Main
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMain
    The mainclass of the game, completely rebuild, for version 2.0. Takes parameters to switch the mode of the game. Three parameters are supported: -nogui, -logconsoleonly, -log, logSilent
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jodder
